description: DescribeExportConfigurations is deprecated. Use DescribeExportTasks, instead.

parameters.name: exportIds
parameters.description: A list of continuous export IDs to search for. (string) ---

nested_items.name: exportId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier used to query an export.

nested_items.name: exportStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the data export job.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A status message provided for API callers.

nested_items.name: configurationsDownloadUrl
nested_items.description: A URL for an Amazon S3 bucket where you can review the exported data. The URL is displayed only if the export succeeded.

nested_items.name: exportRequestTime
nested_items.description: The time that the data export was initiated.

nested_items.name: isTruncated
nested_items.description: If true, the export of agent information exceeded the size limit for a single export and the exported data is incomplete for the requested time range. To address this, select a smaller time range for the export by using startDate and endDate.

nested_items.name: requestedStartTime
nested_items.description: The value of startTime parameter in the StartExportTask request. If no startTime was requested, this result does not appear in ExportInfo.

nested_items.name: requestedEndTime
nested_items.description: The endTime used in the StartExportTask request. If no endTime was requested, this result does not appear in ExportInfo.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token from the previous call to describe-export-tasks.
